document.topic_text: Teen driver fled from police A teenage driver lied to police by pretending he was going back to his car to get proof he was insured but drove off. Caleb Vaughan led police on a high speed pursuit through Fleetwood driving at more than twice the speed limit and through several red lights, while he had a child and woman on board. When he later went to the police station because police wanted to speak to him Vaughan again drove his car without insurance. Vaughan, 19, of Waverley Avenue, North Shore, pleaded guilty to an offence of driving dangerously and two offences of driving without insurance.
